resources.string: Hello student hope you are all fine,so basically I made this application For you because in my Time I asking to ma\'am to give me notes and syllabus so ma\'am gives but she take some time for it.So here you can download all things whatever you need. And Student also go directly in AvitCamu,AvitCollegeAddress, AvitWebsite, VmrfWevsite and take benefit,Also for hostel student many time student don\'t know what is today\'s in mess-canteen so here i solve these problem now,you can see all food routine,if any enquire you have then send me email
